title: Fusion Tactical Military Police Shooters Belt Generation II Black Large 38-43"/2" Wide
features: Made in the USA and Imported
Fusion Tactical Military Police Shooters Belt is a single belt system that incorporates the sturdiness of your over belt into your last chance belt.
Heavy duty triple layer of 2" coated MIL-SPEC Type 13 webbing reinforced by 7 rows of stitching
Raptor Generation II quick release buckle is strength rated up to 18 kn yet offers a lightweight and easier alternative to the standard 2 belt system.
Stitched nylon loop is tested up to 5,000 lbs eliminating the need for steel D-rings to help you lighten your load even more.
Please use your PANTS SIZE for ordering, NOT the actual waist measurement. USA Made Shooters Belt Black Large 38-43"/2" Wide
description: Fusion Tactical Military Police Shooters Belt Generation II Black Large 38-43"/2" Wide - Fusion Tactical Military Police Shooters Belt is a single belt system that incorporates the sturdiness of your over belt into your last chance belt. - Heavy duty triple layer of 2" coated MIL-SPEC Type 13 webbing reinforced by 7 rows of stitching - Raptor Generation II quick release buckle is strength rated up to 18 kn yet offers a lightweight and easier alternative to the standard 2 belt system. - Stitched nylon loop is tested up to 5,000 lbs eliminating the need for steel D-rings to help you lighten your load even more. - Proudlby made in USA
